events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is different from what I purchased.
The customer's report about a wrong item was reviewed and categorized under 'Refund' due to requested money back.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding the wrong item received.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 458922 and I've attached photos of the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thanks for the info! We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response and refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this issue quickly.
The refund has been processed and the case has been resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on your recent refund experience with our support team.
